The station is serviced by many trains (See below). ==History== The station was built in 1873 by the [[Chemins de fer Orientaux]] on their [[Ä°stanbul]]-[[Vienna]] main line. The station was serviced by the world famous [[Orient Express]], between [[Ä°stanbul]] and [[Paris]]. The [[Turkish State Railways]] took over the CO in 1937 and took over the station as well.
